lines.text: I'm thinking this faked death idea is on the money, now!
Huh? Don't tell me you've got another harebrained explanation up your sleeve.
That first thing made sense, but-
Like, you see that blood all over the place?
Who's to say it's <c=#FF00FF>his</c> blood? They've got a half-empty bottle of the stuff sitting right there, don't they?
Wha... half-empty? The extra-virgin virgin's blood?
Or half-full. Depends on your perspective.
But yeah! That puddle of blood is store-bought, not homemade!
I mean, I could buy that- someone else's blood, the heartbeat frozen...
But gimme a break, kid. There's a dang <c=#FF00FF>hole</c> in him!
You think the blood was from a bottle, when there's a neat little wound to gush the stuff?
